title: Apartments complex for Sale
details:
Fully Furnished Apartments in Colombo 5 for Sale.
Three storey building with Roof Top Terrace and 02 Three Bedroom Apartments , 01 Two Bedroom Apartment and also 01 single room Studio. All are fully equipped with Fridge,Cooker, Microwave, Washing machine, air-conditioning and also plates and cutleries.
Very popular among foriegn deligates.
